The Tarkarahasya
	    Critical Edition
	  Three Sanskrit Texts from the Buddhis Pramāṇa-Tradition
	    The Hetuvidyā Section in the Yogācārabhūmi, the Darmottaraṭippanaka, and the Tarkarahasya
	    Hideomi Yaita
	    Naritasan Shinshoji
	      Narita
	      2005
	    261-407

content.value: Double quotes in the text (that is, not in the notes) were encoded as quote-elements. Single quotes, as q-elements.

In the book the text was printed on the left page and the notes on the right pages. The notes were numbered by page an line. In this file the notes were encoded as note-elements with their corresponding n-attribute and are located either after the item(s) they refer or at the end of the line, when they do not refer to a specific word or syllable.
In the notes, variant readings quotations from other texts or the Tarkarahasya itself were enclosed in a q-element with their corresponding xml:lang-attribute.
In the notes, the abbreviations S and P were expanded to "Source" and "Parallel"
The text is divided in 6 parts, encoded as div-elements.
Additions by the SARIT-encoder are enclosed in a supplied-element.

List of abbreviations. The abbreviations in the first column appear in the print edition of the text. The abbreviations in brackets are used in the attributes ed, cRef and xml:id's in this file. Unless otherwise indicated, references are by page and line number of the edition consulted by Yaita.:

gaṅ źig śes pa'i snaṅ ba bdag ñid kyi rjes su 'gro ba daṅ ldog pa'i rjes su mthun par byed pa de ni mṅon sum ste
yasmin sthite yad utpannaṃ sthita eva vina
paścād vadanato bhinnaṃ pratibhāsas tathāstu naḥ
bhāsasya tadvat syād iti naivedam īkṣyate
prāk sattvaṃ tasya nīlādeḥ pratibhāsād itīṣyatām||
niṣpāditakriye kañcid viśeṣam asamādadhat| karmaṇy aindriyam anyad vā sādhanam itīṣyate||
sgrub par byed pa yin no źes bya ba yaṅ sgrub par byed pa'i tshul las 'das pa yin no
svarūpaṃ ca na śabdārthas tatrādhyakṣam ato 'khilam||
aparokṣatā kuto bhavati. yena rūpeṇa tat saṃveda
tac ca rūpaṃ grāhyagrāhakākārāparokṣatā nāmaikyam, yathā ca sukham,
yathā ca nīlādyākāraḥ. yathā cāparokṣatā samasamayasambhavitayā
bhāsamānaṃ svarūpeṇa pīḍā duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ yadā|
na tadālambanaṃ jñānaṃ na tadaivaṃ prasajyate||
tad eva ca yogyatvam ucyate. yataś cakṣurālokā
ekārthasamavāyinā tu jñānena saṃvedyanta iti naiyāyikāḥ.
bde ba la sogs pa rnams ni rig pa'i raṅ bźin ñid ma yin no, 'on kyaṅ don gcig la 'du ba can gyi śes pas rig par bya ba yin no
niścīyate ceti katham upapadyatām. ekārthāśrayiṇā vijñānena vedyatve
iha ca rūpādau vastuni dṛśyamāne āntaraḥ sukhādyākāras tulyakālaṃ saṃvedyate
iha nīlādau dṛśyamāne samānakālam āntaraḥ sukhādir niyamenānubhūtaniścitas
jātās taṃ muktvā sukhādīn eva sā kathaṃ pratipadyeta. tad āha:
muktvā taṃ pratipadyeta sukhādīn eva sā katham||
athātmamanoyogamātrād utpannaṃ jñānaṃ sukhādīnāṃ grāhakaṃ nendriyajam. tathā sati yugapaj jñānānudayāt kramagrahaṇena bhāvyam
tal lāghavāc cet tat tulyam ity asaṃvedanaṃ na kim
tulyaṃ khalu lāghavaṃ viṣayavedane sukhavedane cety asaṃvedanaṃ
na caikayā dvayajñānaṃ niyamād akṣacetasaḥ| sukhādyabhāve 'py arthāc ca jātes tacchaktyasiddhitaḥ||
athāpi syāt, yathā nīlaṃ pītaṃ ca pṛ
viṣayaś ca pṛthak saṃhatāv api svajñānajanane
api sukhaṃ gṛhyeta nīlavat. na ca
tasya taddhetvartham agṛhṇataḥ|| na hi saṃvedanaṃ yuktam
sahagrahaḥ. tathāpi na sāmarthyaṃ sukhasya syāt, anvaya
arthenaiva sahagrahe kiṃ sāmarthyaṃ sukhādīnāṃ neṣṭā dhīr yat tadudbhavā
rekābhāvāt. na ca parasya sukhasāmarthyābhyupagama indriyadhiyaṃ
atha vinārthena cakṣurādibhiḥ sukhaṃ gṛhyate. tadānukūlatvā
vinārthena sukhādīnāṃ vedane cakṣurādibhiḥ| rūpādiḥ stryādibhedo 'kṣṇā na gṛhyeta kadācana|| na hi saty antaraṅge 'rthe śakte dhīr bāhyadarśanī|
athāpi yugapad eva buddhir udayati tattadviṣayasambhavāt. tadā
dhiyor yugapadutpattau tattadviṣayasambhavāt| sukhaduḥkhavidau syātāṃ sakṛd arthasya sambhave||
na ca raṇarasāvarjitacetasaḥ svāmisammānanopakāranirdeśaparādhīnam ātmānaṃ saphalañ cikīrṣataḥ śāstrasaṃsparśaduḥkhasamvedanaṃ
vam. tasmād alīkakalpanābhir alam, saralenaiva krameṇa.
sārthe satīndriye yogye yathāsvam api cetasi|
dṛṣṭaṃ janma sukhādīnāṃ tat tulyaṃ manasām api||
asatsu satsu caiteṣu na janmājanma vā kva
dṛṣṭaṃ sukhāder buddher vā tat tato nānyataś ca te||
kutas tarhy utpadyantām. uktam eva: cakṣurādīndriyālokālambana
samanantarapratyayebhyaḥ. tasmāt sādhūktam: iha nīlādau dṛśyamā
cakṣurālokālambanasamanantarapratyayāj jāyamānam eva sukham aparokṣaṃ jāyate
iha ca rūpādau vastuni dṛśyamāne āntaraḥ sukhādyākāras tulyakālaṃ saṃvedyate
iha nīlādau dṛśyamāne samānakālam āntaraḥ sukhādyākāro 'nubhūyate niścīyate
na kāryabhedād api bhedaḥ. ekato 'py anekakāryadarśanāt. sukhaduḥkhā
de'i tshogs pa ñid kyi naṅ gi khyad par gyis byas pa ñid kyi phyir, the tshom daṅ gtan la phebs pa la sogs pa bźin no
prakṛter mahāṃs tato 'haṃkāras tasmād gaṇaś ca ṣoḍaśakaḥ|
mbitāḥ, puṃso 'pi tatraiva bimbanāt, tena gṛhyante.
sthitir bhedaḥ kṣamā kārṣṇyaṃ chāyāyāḥ sarvabhogyatā||
ity ete pārthivā dharmās tadviśiṣṭās tathāpare|
ākāro gauravaṃ raukṣyaṃ varaṇaṃ sthairyam eva ca| sthitir bhedaḥ kṣamā kṛṣṇacchāyā sarvopabhogyate| ity te pārthivā dharmās tadviśiṣṭās tathāpare| jalāgnipavanākāśavyāpakās tān nibodhata||
tra chāyāyā iti kārṣṇyāpekṣayā ṣaṣṭhī kṛṣṇacchāyety
bde ba la sogs pa ni naṅ ma yin la sems pa can yaṅ ma yin gyi…
saṃvedanaṃ na yadrūpaṃ na hi tat tasya vedanam||
'di 'di'i myoṅ bar byed pa yin no źes bya ba'i 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan ni mṅon par gsal ba yin pa'i phyir ro. dbaṅ po la sogs pa yaṅ thal bar 'gyur bas de myoṅ ba'i mtshan ñid ni 'dra ba ñid yin no
upadhāyakaṃ tarhi nīlavat sukham anyad api syāt. na tvatpakṣe 'pi
'di'i bdag ñid 'di 'jog par byed pa gźan yin par ni rigs pa ma yin te
sukharūpam eva hi saṃvedanaṃ sukham avaiti, nānyad i
ma yin te, khyed kyi phyogs la yaṅ bde ba la sogs pa myoṅ ba ni yod pa yin no
tac ca svarūpavedanaṃ kvacit sopadhānam, kvacin nirupadhānam.
idam eva ca naḥ sukhaṃ yat sātaṃ saṃvedanaṃ nāma, na sātasaṃvedanād
sim par myoṅ ba gaṅ yin pa 'di ñid kyaṅ kho bo cag gi bde ba yin pa'i phyir
eva phalam, kin tu rañjanādikam api, tadvaśāt tatra
atra punaḥ saṃvedanam evaikam āntaraṃ prīti
de la yaṅ dga' ba daṅ yoṅs su gdud par gcig tu naṅ na ñams su myoṅ ba ñid du mthoṅ ṅo
hi: nānyat saṃvedanaṃ grāhakam, anyaś ca sukhādyākāro grāhyarūpaḥ
sate. yena grāhakākārād vicchinnasya sukhāder bahīrūpa
vidmaḥ. na hi ya ākāro bahīrūpeṇa grāhyākāratayā
, tad yathā cetanāyā ākāraḥ. tathā ca
na hi surabhikarkaśādyanubhavatas tad eva bāhyaṃ vastu
sukhitaṃ duḥkhitam hṛṣṭaṃ dviṣṭaṃ vā pratyava
vicchinnam ahaṅkārāspadam āntaraṃ grāhakam evaṃrūpam hṛṣṭaṃ
dviṣṭaṃ vā pratibhāti. tad evam grāhakarūpasanniviṣṭasya sukhāder
bāhyāḥ sukhādayaḥ prāpnuvantīti. ata eva yogināṃ parasantānavartinaḥ

gcig tu źes bya ba 'dis ni phyi rol gyi byas pa 'gog par brjod pa'o. 'di ltar gaṅ gis phyi rol gyi raṅ bźin ñid kyis 'dzin pa'i rnam pa las rnam par chad pa'i bde ba la sogs pa la phyi rol gyis byas pa ñid du rig par 'gyur ba myoṅ bar byed pa 'dzin pa'i raṅ bźin yaṅ gźan la, bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa gzuṅ ba'i raṅ bźin yaṅ gźan du snaṅ ba ni med pa'i phyir ro. gaṅ gi phyir rnam pa gaṅ źig phyi rol gyi raṅ bźin gzuṅ bar bya ba ñid du snaṅ ba ma yin pa de ni phyi rol gyis byas pa ma yin te, dper na sems pa'i rnam pa bźin no. bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa yaṅ de bźin no. 'di ñid bstan pa'i don du naṅ du źes gsuṅs so. bde ba la sogs pa'i raṅ bźin myoṅ ba la gnas pa ni naṅ du bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gźi 'dzin pa'i rnam par mthoṅ gi phyi rol gzuṅ ba'i rnam par ni ma yin te, dri źim po daṅ rtsub mo la sogs pa ñams su myoṅ ba na phyi rol gyi dṅos po de ñid bde ba 'am sdug bsṅal ba 'am 'dod pa 'am sdaṅ bar snaṅ ba ni med kyi 'on kyaṅ, 'dod pa daṅ sdaṅ ba ni de las rnam par chad pa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gźi naṅ gi 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i raṅ bźin du snaṅ ba'i phyir ro. de'i phyir de ltar 'dzin pa'i raṅ bźin du gnas pa'i bde ba la sogs pa la phyi rol tu lhag par źen pa med pa'i phyir phyi rol gyi byas pa ma yin te. de'i phyir kho bo cag la bde ba la sogs pa phyi rol yin par mi 'gyur ro. de ñid kyi phyhir gźan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i bde ba la sogs pa daṅ chags pa la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams phyi rol gyi ka ba la sogs pa bźin du bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gźi ma yin pa gzuṅ ba'i rnam par bde ba 'am chags pa 'am sdaṅ bas bde ba daṅ chags pa la sogs pa rnams su thal ba med do
atrārthe yuktir apy ucyate: ye bāhyātiśayanirapekṣabhāvanātiśaya
raṅ bźin gyi khyad par mi ltos par goms pa'i khyad par yod pa daṅ med pa'i rjes su 'brel pa de dag ni naṅ ñid yin te, śes rab la sogs pa bźin no
khādayaḥ. yo bhāvanayeṣṭādyābhāsaḥ sarvātmanā vinivartate, viparītaś
dper na tshba'i rdzas gcig ñid la
rṅa mo la sogs pa bźin no
yad ahaṅkārāspadatvenābhyasyate tat tathaiva bhāvanāprakarṣe niṣpad
āśrayati. priyam api hitatvenāsakṛd bhāvayann anukūlavīrahṛdayaḥ.
bāhyatvam, tac ca bāhyabhāvābhāvānuvidhāyitvena vyāptam, yathā
mānam āntaram eva bhavati. ata eva virodho 'pi yayor virodhanipatitaḥ
eva sphuṭābhaṃ bhavati, yathā yathābhūtamatiḥ, āntaratvena
sāṅkhye prati bādhakaṃ hi pramāṇam adṛṣṭāntam api dṛṣṭāntayanti.
saṃvedanaṃ na yadrūpaṃ na hi tat tasya vedanam||
ity atrāntare vivecitam. tarhi vijñānavādaḥ prasaktaḥ. na kiñcit
sopadhānam anupadhānaṃ ca kiñcid ity atrāntare
apy atra yad anuvartate tad veditavyam.
pūrvavan nirvikalpakam abhrāntaṃ ca, svasaṃvedane pramā
iti sā yogyatā mānam ātmā meyaḥ phalaṃ svavit||
de la'aṅ ñams myoṅ bdag ñid phyir
…gsal bar snaṅ gyur pa'i| śes gaṅ slu ba can min pa| rtog med…
…gsal bar snaṅ źiṅ rnam par rtog pa med pa phyin ci ma log pa'i yul can…
bhūtaḥ sadbhūto 'rthaḥ, pramāṇena dṛṣṭaś ca sadbhūtaḥ
ca. heyo hi hātum arthyate, upādeyaś copādātum. tatra heyaṃ
jñane, tenaiva bhūtārthety atra na sarva

bhūtasya bhāvanā punaḥ punaś cetasi viniveśanam. bhāvanāyāḥ prakarṣo bhāvyamānārthābhāsasya jñānasya sphuṭābhatvārambhaḥ. prakarṣasya paryanto yadā sphuṭābhatvam īṣad asampūrṇaṃ bhavati…tasmāt paryantād yajjātaṃ bhāvyamānasyārthasya…
sphuṭatvārambhaḥ, tasya parisamāptaṃ gamanaṃ paryantaḥ, tasmāj
. yāṃ hi daśām abhiniviśya bhāvanā vṛttā tasyā a
nāpakṣe tu, kim api vastv astu, tadgatam anityatvādi
yat sphurati tat priyatvāśliṣṭam. tadvad ihāpi, yat kiñcid vastujātaṃ
parikaritaṃ svaviṣayavijñānaṃ sphuṭaṃ janayataḥ. tena paramārtha
viṣaye kṣaṇikatvādau cakṣurjñānam api sad yogijñānam.
gṛhītagrāhitvaṃ hi doṣo na gṛhyamāṇagrāhitvam, yathā
ṇatvaṃ sphuṭāsphuṭatvam. ata eva svapnenāpi manovedana
tasmād bhūtam abhūtaṃ vā yad yad evātibhā
bhūtaṃ satyam, abhūtaṃ vā yad evātiśayena bhāvyate
yad asatyaṃ tat pūrvavijñānārūḍham, tasmād avyatiriktam uttarasya
jñānasya hetur ucyate. yat tu satyaṃ

yaṅ dag pa ste bden pa 'am yaṅ dag pa ma yin par yaṅ ruṅ ste gaṅ kho na śin tu bsgom pa de ñid bsgoms pa mthar phyin pa ni gsal ziṅ mi rtog pa'i blo'i rgyur 'gyur ro. gaṅ źig mi bden pa de la ni rnam par śes pa sṅa ma la snaṅ ba de las tha dad pa med par śes pa phyi ma'i rgyur brjod pa. bden pa gaṅ yin pa de la ni rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par śes pas bsgom par bya ba raṅ gi ṅo bo ñid kyis gsal ba'i rgyur gyur ba yin śes pa la snaṅ ba ni ma yin no
iti vākyam atiricyeta. asatyārthaṃ ca kiñcin na syāt.
The underlined part corresponds to the text of
tattvaprāpaṇāc ca pramāṇaṃ bhagavān mumukṣūṇām iti.

prayogaḥ: yā sādaranairantaryadīrghakālaviśeṣaṇā bhāvanā, sā karatalāyamānagrāhyāvabhāsamānajñānaphalā, tadyathā kāmāturasya kāminībhāvanā. yathoktaviśeṣaṇatrayayuktā ca sarvākārasarvagatanairātmyabhāvanā kāruṇikasyeti svabhāvahetuḥ
yo yaḥ sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsasahitacetoguṇaḥ sa sarvaḥ sphuṭībhāvayogyaḥ, yathā yuvatyākāraḥ kāminaḥ puruṣasya, yathoktābhyāsasahitacetoguṇās cāmī caturāryasatyaviṣayā ākārā iti…
yad yad bhāvyate tat tad bhāvanāprakarṣaparyante sphuṭābhaṃ saṃbhavati, yathā kāmukasya kāminyākāraḥ, bhāvyante ca paramapuruṣārthinā kṣaṇikatve nairātmyādayo vastudharmā iti
bhāṣitam: bhūtārthabhāvaneti lakṣaṇam, pramāṇena ca bhū
na ca sarvaviṣayam indriyajam adhyakṣam, nāpy anumānaṃ dharmādy
asiddheḥ, nāpi manomātram etad indriyānusāritvāt, nāpy āgamāśrayam
eṣaiva niṣpattyavasthā kathaṃ syād iti cet, ajñānam etat. yuktijñena
r vastubhiḥ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca sambaddhaṃ
budhyate yatnavatā krameṇa prakṛṣyamāṇam, tathaiva smaryate. tathā
hi: iyaṃ me mātā mātṛparamparāṇāṃ pūrvā koṭiḥ sambaddhā,
bhāvanājñānam apy asti sadarthe 'nādaro na hi||
yathāyatham arthasya sarvasya vācakaṃ sarvavākyam, tathā ca niḥśe
tad evaṃ samāsārthaḥ: yaḥ kaścit paraiḥ sarvasarvavidaṃ praty
cakṣuḥ paśyati rūpāṇi sabhāgaṃ na ta
sabhāgaṃ savijñānakam yadā bhavati tadā paśyati anyadā neti
vijñānaṃ dṛśyate rūpaṃ na kilāntaritaṃ yataḥ||
kṣād utpadyate jñānam, atha ca pratyakṣam
ity ākhyāyate na prativiṣayaṃ kena hetunā.
ci ste gaṅ gi phyir gñis la brten nas bskyed pa'i rnam par śes pa la bdaṅ po la brten pa źes brjod kyi, yul la rten pa cis na ma yin źe na,…
vaibhāṣikāpekṣayā ca manoviṣayatvena vyabhicārāt. asādhāraṇena ca
vyapadeśo dṛṣṭaḥ, yathā bherīśabdo yathā vā yavāṅkuraḥ.
thun moṅ ma yin pa las tha sñad byed pa yaṅ mthoṅ ste, dper na rṅa'i sgra daṅ nas kyi myu gu źes pa bźin no
yid kyi rnam par śes pa daṅ thun moṅ pa yin no
ālekhyādāv ekasya dravyasyābhāve samavāyābhāvād ity arthaḥ.
vanaṃ kusumitaṃ yathā. tatra hi vanaṃ bahutvasaṅkhyālakṣaṇam
vanaṃ kusumitam ity upacāraḥ. ekayā buddhyā anekasya grahaṇe
manīṣayā gṛhyate tathā sañcito 'pi. tat kim ucyate:
ko vā virodho bahavaḥ sañjātātiśayāḥ sa
pūrvam ekāyatanatvena buddhir ekety uktam. adhunā punar
bhāvaḥ syāt. ekopādānatvād bhede 'pi na tatheti cet, atītādi
smaraṇam eva syāt, na sphuṭasphuraṇam. tathā citravijñāne jñānād
anekākāram, ekākāravad anekākāram ity api bodhyam. sā yady anekākārā
kriyeta, tathā na kaścid virodhaḥ. tasmād ubhayathāpi sañcitālambanatve
svenāsādhāraṇena rūpeṇa vedyaḥ svabhāvo na dharmitvādinā. ata eva
svasaṃvedanaṃ cākārayoḥ sādhitam eva. svasaṃvedane tarhi
api tādātmyam iti cet, na, ekenaiva gatatvāt. vyapadeśā ete yathā
raparigrahaḥ, karotyarthādivat. yathā pacati pākaṃ karoti,
tathā karoti karaṇam abhinirvartayati. sarvo hi dhātvarthaḥ karoty
sāmānyaviśeṣakalpanā cet, ihāpi samānam. evam anumāne 'pi vācyam.
yady arthapratītirūpatvāt tad eva pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaphalam,
sāmānyena vyutpāditam api pramāṇapadaṃ kartṛkarmakriyāḥ samākṣipya
vivakṣyate yadā tatra karaṇatvaṃ tadā smṛtam||
kriyāsādhanam ity eva sarvaṃ sarvasya karmaṇaḥ|
arthena ghaṭayaty enāṃ na hi muktvārtharūpatām|
kārasya sārūpyam iti kartṛpāratantryam uktam. tadvaśād iti sva
karaṇaṃ hi kartṛparatantraṃ svavyāpārāviṣṭaṃ pradhānakriyāyām upayogavat
anumānasiddhatvam asya veditavyam, tac cānumānaṃ mānase
bhaṭṭasya punaḥ ālocanājñānaṃ pramāṇam, tataḥ paraṃ
prāptiḥ, tataḥ sukham iti pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇam. uttaram
tataḥ paraṃ punar vastu dharmair jātyādibhir yayā
yad vendriyaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt tasya vārthena saṅgatiḥ|
indriyair manaso yogaḥ pramāṇaṃ sarvam eva vā||
manaso vendriyair yoga ātmanā sarva eva vā
phalam, nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhir iti vacanāt.
jaḍapramāṇatāyām indriyādi pūrvavat, nirākāratayā jñānam a
vastugrāhi ca, tataḥ paraṃ jñānaṃ na sidhyati.
'di ni khyad par can gyi śes pa la, 'di ni khyad par gyi śes pa'o źes rnam par gźag pa mi 'grub ste
ekārthatve dvayaṃ vyarthaṃ na cāsti kramabhāvitā|
cakṣurādi tu sutarām arthapratīter na niyāmakam anākāratayaiva
sākāratve vā kim anyena. arthasārūpyam eva pramāṇam
a jñānasya, nāpīndriyādeḥ. tathā hi nīlākāraṃ yasmād
tad eva pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaphalam iti paramārthā
paramārthatas tv ākāra eva prakāśamānaḥ pramitiḥ
notpatananipatane parśuto vyatiricyete| tasyaivāparāparadeśasaṅginy utpattis tathā vyapadeśavatī|
pallavatālakṣaṇā pākakriyā kādācitkī yadi devadattasvabhāvaḥ syān na
ḥ pācako bhaved ity evānādivāsanāvaśād anvayavyatirekā
bhyāṃ bhede kriyādivyavasthitiḥ syāt. tato yasminn abhinne
yo hi yasminn abhinne bhidyate sa tasmād vyatiricyate. paramārthatas tu devadatta eva
loka ekatvāropeṇa pravartata iti tadanurodhāt kriyākārakavyavasthā
evam ākāro 'pi na phalādhigativyāpakaḥ, adhigatis tu sakalākāravyāpikā, tato bhedavyavasthā pramitipramāṇayoḥ

tatra sādharmyavatyogaḥ. yad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ san nopalabhyate so 'sadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ siddho yathānyaḥ kaścid dṛṣṭaḥ śaśaviṣāṇādiḥ, nopalabhyate ca kvacit pradeśaviśeṣa upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa ity anupalabdhiprayogaḥ

kalpanām arhati. bhūtalaviśeṣeṇa ghaṭād anyasaṃjñena tasyā buddheḥ

ekasya tu pratisandhātur abhāve 'pi bhede 'pi vahnyādiprameyasya,
bhede 'pi yatra tajjñānaṃ tāṃs tathā pratipadyate||
vastūnāṃ vidyate tasmāt tanniṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ|
jñā ghaṭe chinnodbhinnakadalīkāṇḍe 'pi tādṛg eva. lakṣaṇayukte
dharmādhyāsaśūnyaviṣayā sā pramāṇam, itarā tv apramāṇam
kim pramāṇāntareṇa pratyabhijñayaiva vā. anyena siddhau kiṃ pratyabhi
jñayā, tayā siddhāv anyonyāśrayaṇam. tasmād ekāva
va kṛtaṃ karma ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyatīty api vacanam,
niyatarūpāṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prabandham ekatvenādhyavasīya sa evāhaṃ
ity atra na bauddhasya nityaṃ sattvaṃ
veditavyam. ākādācitkatvaṃ sattvaṃ nityam uktam, na tu sad akāraṇavan
yathā yathā hi hetūnām abhāvo nityatā tathā|
dravaśakter yataḥ kledaḥ sā tv ekaiva dvayor api||
tha dad gśer ñid ji ltar yin
kim asyātmā na bhinno dravatā katham|
ity api dharmo vyāpriyate kvacit, kvacid dharmy eva. e
kvacid dharma utpadyate. yathā kuḍyāde raktatā. kvacid dharmy eva,
nanu sa ca kiṃ sad utpadyate 'thāsat. sataḥ kim utpādena, asato
vākyam asambaddham. śaśasambandhi viṣāṇaṃ nāstīti bruvāṇaṃ prati:
dṛṣṭā śaktir matā sā cet saṃvṛtyāstu yathā tathā||
ty adhivacanaṃ nānādare. śarāc charotpāde, tādṛśām
ādikāraṇaṃ tādṛśaṃ sarvathā dṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ na vyabhicarati kāryātmā.
na tu yajjātīyaṃ kāryaṃ tajjātīyam eva kāraṇam api.
na cākārabheda eva kāraṇānāṃ tattvātattvanibandhanam, api tu
phale, vandhyetarayor iva karkaṭayoḥ. kvacid rase, vanyetarayo
tasmāt suvivecitaṃ kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ vyabhicarati.

rnam pa tha dad pa 'ba' źig ni de daṅ de ma yin pa'i rgyu mtshan yaṅ ma yin no. 'on kyaṅ raṅ bźin gźan yaṅ yin te, bcos ma daṅ bcos ma ma yin pa'i nor bu daṅ mu tig daṅ byi ru la sogs pa bźin no. kha cig tu ni me tog tha dad pa ste, sṅon po daṅ cig śos kyi me tog can gyi śur pa ka bźin no. kha cig tu ni 'bras bu ste, 'bras bu med pa daṅ cig śos kyi kar go ta bźin no. kha cig tu ni ro las te, nags daṅ cig śos kyi rgyal mo ga gon bźin no. kha cig tu ni nus pa ste, reg pa daṅ myaṅs pas 'khru ba'i a ru ra bźin no. de'i phyir śin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'bras bu ni rgyu la 'khrul ba med do
vṛṣṭer anumānam. na dṛṣṭer api tu vṛṣṭiyogyatāyāḥ.
śabdārthaḥ katham. iti cet, ucyate. sahaiva kurvanti, parasparāpekṣāṃ
kurvanti, apekṣatā ca kāryatā kāryatātiśayādhānam ato gamya
kurvanti kāryam. kim anayā kaṣṭasṛṣṭyā, kāryam eva kiṃ nānumīyate.
ādyātiśayakrameṇa sāmagrīphalabhūtāḥ yāḥ śaktayaḥ, tāsāṃ pari
yathā dehendriyabuddhibhyo rāgādyanumānam| ātmātmīyābhiniveśapūrvakā hi rāgādayo…
asamagrāt kāraṇānupalabdhyā nāsti. tasmād dehādīnāṃ hetu
kevalānāṃ sāmarthyam astīti vipakṣavṛtter adṛṣṭāv api śeṣavadanumānāt
nāntarīyakam eva kāryaṃ kāraṇam anumāpayet, tatpratibandhāt.
rūkṣaṃ ca vacanaṃ kāryam. ataḥ kāryamātrād vacanamātrād rāgasya
vacanasya sambhavāt. tathā pakvāny etāni phalāni madhurarasāni vā
samānarūpatvād ekaśākhāprabhāvād vā upayuktaphalavat. tathā bahulaṃ
na hi bahulaṃ pakvadarśane 'pi sthālyantargamanamātreṇa pākaḥ sidhyati
vāg ata idam iti viduṣaḥ svanidānā
kriyeta jagadādau vā kartraivaikena kenacit|| ityādi.
nīlārtham antareṇa. tato na nīlasvalakṣaṇaṃ pratyeti, na sāmānyā
-na. yo hy anyonyāsambhavī viśeṣas tatra kāraṇabhedād
bhedaḥ. yaḥ punar aviśeṣeṇa sarvasya tasya kāraṇamātrād eva bhāvo,
svahetor eva bhavati, tathā bhāvānāṃ naśvaraḥ
svabhāvaḥ. dṛṣṭanivṛttīnāṃ vā bhāvānāṃ yathā nāśo hetvantarānapekṣo
śvaraṃ syād iti cet, na, rūpavedanā
deśakālāntariteṣu yadi kṛtakeṣu śaṅkā syād dṛ
ṇīyam, tad anyeṣāṃ kṛtakatvena naśvaratvaṃ na sādhyate, yathā
yadi nāma kālo nāma mahābhūtādivyatirikto nāsti tathāpi tair eva
grīṣmādayaḥ padārthā hi viṣayā eva kecana|
tasmād iyam anapekṣā vināśaṃ prati kṛtakatvasya viparyaye
bādhakaṃ pramāṇam. yato rūpādīnāṃ yadi deśakālāvasthāsu kāsu
eva vināśaḥ syāt tadā tatsāpekṣo vināśo nirapekṣatayā pratīto na syāt.
nanu vyāptir nāma sambandhaḥ, sa kiṃsvabhāvo
tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya sambandho nāsti bhāvataḥ||
yadi svabhāvasaṃśleṣo na hi sambandhino dvitvam, atha
The last leaf with numbering in
ends here. However, there are two unnumbered leaves, which are indirectly continued from above. They are named X and Y in the present work. Cf.
saṃyogaḥ. saṃyogajaś ca saṃyogaḥ, yathā sarvaiḥ samavāyikāraṇair
syān na saṃyogajananāt saṃyoginau. kiṃ tarhi. sthāpanāt.

'di lta ste 'ga' źig gi las kyis skyes pa daṅ gñis ka'i las kyis skyes pa ni sbyor bar 'dod do. sogs pa smos pas ni sbyor ba yaṅ sbyor ba can du 'gyur bar bsdus te. 'di ltar de ni sbyor ba las skyes par yaṅ 'dod do. sbyor ba skyed pa'i phyir sbyor ba can ma yin gyi, 'o na ci źe na, 'jog par byed do źe na yaṅ de mi ruṅ ste. gnas par byed pa 'aṅ rab tu brjod
saṃyogādyāśraye yogyam ayogyaṃ tac ca jāyate
ñca ye yogyam ayogyaś cāpi jāyate
. evaṃ vibhaktādāv api vācyam. tasmāt saṃyogavibhā
na, tulyaparyanuyogataḥ. tavāpi tulyarūpasya vibhaktādeḥ kiṃ na
gasya dravyāt kiṃ na jāyate. tasmād daṇḍakuṇḍalādidravyaṃ
tmabhāvaṃ saṃyogasamavāye yogyam ājāyata iti tvayā va
asmākam api tarhi saṃyogādikam anicchatāṃ tulyam etat.

de bas na sbyor ba daṅ bral ba na sbyor ba daṅ bral ba'i las ni sbyor ba la sogs pa'i blo'i rgyu mtshan yin no źe na, de mi ruṅ ste, dri ba mtshuṅs pa'i phyir ro. khyed kyi yaṅ ṅo bo 'dra ba yin na bral ba la sogs pa la sbyor ba la sogs pa ci ste mi 'du, de skyed par byed pa'i las med pa'i phyir bral ba ni sbyor ba ma yin no źe na, de ltar las kyaṅ ci ste med, de'i rgyu yaṅ ci ste med ces bya ba'i lan gdab dka'o. de bas na khyed ñid kyis kyaṅ sṅar bral ba la sogs pa'i ṅo bor mi ruṅ ba phyis sbyor ba la sogs pa'i gnas ruṅ ba'i dṅos po de 'gyur te. ci'i phyir źe na, 'di ltar sbyor ba la sogs pa daṅ ldan par ruṅ ba'i dṅos po rtag na ni, de daṅ bral ba 'gal phyir te. sbyor ba la sogs pa daṅ ldan pa ni bral bar 'gal lo źes de skad brjod par bya dgos so. ṅed kyis kyaṅ sbyor ba la sogs pa daṅ bral ba yin no źes de skad brjod par bya'o

de bas na bral daṅ ldan daṅ 'gro sogs pas śes bya ba la sbyor ba daṅ bral ba'i las kyi tshig gis ruṅ ba'i tshig brjod pa na don gyi ṅo bo 'di la ṅes par brjod. de'i tshe don med pa'i 'gro ba la sogs pa gźan brtags pas ci źig bya ste cuṅ zad kyaṅ mi bya'o
niṣiddhaḥ pāratantryam ityādinā. kutaḥ sambandhābhāve tannibandhano

gaṅ gi phyir 'gro ba la sogs pa de dag rnams la brtags te yod na yaṅ 'di'i źes 'brel pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir te. gźan gyi dbaṅ can źes bya ba la sogs pa 'brel pa rnam pa thams cad du bkag pas 'di'i las daṅ sbyor ba daṅ bral ba źes bya ba'i 'brel pa ma grub pa'i phyir de'i rgyu mtshan can gyi brjod pa ga la yod, ji ltar gźan du rtogs pa'i las la sogs pa ni de gźan daṅ 'brel pa ma yin te, ma 'brel pa'i phyir ro. mṅon par 'dod pa yaṅ de bźin no. gaṅ gi phyir de ltar las la sogs pa daṅ 'brel pa'i phyir 'gro ba la sogs pa ma yin pa de bas na, rgyun mi 'chad par skye ba'i gźi rkyen gźan daṅ gźan gyis skad cig ma so sor skye ba'i dṅos po rnams ni dṅos po tha dad 'di yin rigs te
: The folio Xa begins here. Continued from
brtan pa gcig pu'i ṅo bo ni sbyor ba la sogs pa'i 'brel pa ma yin pas …
tad evaṃ pāratantryaṃ rūpaśleṣo nairantaryaṃ prāptiḥ saṅgatir
kiṃ tarhi, bhāvānām ātmānam avibhāgavantam adhikṛtya
kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sāṃvṛtaḥ. yato bhinnān eva bhāvān miśrayati
kalpanā, sā cāvidyānubhavavāsanāsambandhāj jāyamānā viparītā ca
pratyakṣāṃ ca dhiyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāś ceṣṭābhidhādikam|
ttānumānaṃ ca na syād ātmany adarśanāt||
taṃ ca kāyavyāpāraṃ vyavahāraṃ cātmasamīhānubhavam antareṇā
nupapattyā svabuddhivedane sarvam etad bhaviṣyatīty api na yuktaḥ.
yady anubhūyeta tadā nedam anubhūyata iti svapa
tad evaṃ bāhye 'rthe svasaṃvedanena pratyakṣeṇa buddhyanubhave
